title: Allow bulk (multiple) character creation in Admin Panel

requirements.summary: Update the CharactersPanel admin UI to allow adding multiple characters in a single session with add/remove controls and batch submission
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Add Character' modal displays at least one character form entry by default.
An 'Add Another Character' button appends a new blank character form entry to the modal.
Each character entry has a remove button to delete that entry (disabled when only one entry remains).
Each entry includes all existing fields: name, initials, clan, role, and bio.
Submitting the form saves all character entries at once via the bulk backend method.
Success and error states are communicated clearly to the admin.
After a successful bulk save, the character list is refreshed.

file_operations.description: Update the CharactersPanel component to support bulk character creation. Replace the single-character form state with an array of character form entries. Add an 'Add Another Character' button that appends a new blank entry to the array. Add a remove button next to each entry (disabled when only one remains). Update the form submission handler to call the backend addCharacters method with the array of character entries. Preserve all existing single-character edit/update functionality. Ensure the character list refreshes after successful bulk submission and display clear success/error messages to the admin.
